channel.title: Prince is Useless
channel.description: The reason in tos jailor is existed is because king didn't, the main reason was to get claims, but since all everyone does is claim to king or mystic there is really no point, the only good thing about it is I guess if you know two people are evil then you could just jail 1 and exe the other, but that's about it he is completely useless. I know this maybe a quite controversial opinion but I believe it's true.

item.title: Prince is Useless
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
i’m just going to say it’s objectively better to PRETEND you’re doing the SF mystic meta, not do it as GK and instead SF somebody else who’s confirmed BD, and put down that that person is the Mystic in your logs so they have to prove themself if you die

bam, that’s 3 100% cleared players
Prince is still powerful as hell, and I don’t even get what your argument actually is

Read full topic

item.title: Prince is Useless
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
lets compare this to ToS, since you did already

ToS has mayor that can spawn, meaning already 1 confirmed Town
also Jailor spawns guaranteed, so thats already 2 confirmed, if mayor spawns
also no conversions, meaning if you’re confirmed and there are no vampires, your confirmed permanently

now lets look at ToL:
ToL has a king that spawns, meaning there always is a king, but it can be either good/evil. 65% good, 35% evil.
Prince spawns guaranteed, so thats 1 confirmed
there are conversions, meaning there is no such thing as “confirmed” (unless your Prince)

Plus, in ToS, there are only up to Powerful attacks in the base game, meaning if a Doctor stays on the Jailor, its GG, unless Arsonist.

In ToL, is a Physician stays on the Prince, heres what can bypass it:
Reaper’s Reap
Enforcer’s Frenzy with assassinate
Possessor’s Possess
any Killer class Empowered by CW
and more(maybe i forgot some)

plus Whisper meta is worse, since Noble, Possessor, Aristocrat, or Apostle can see your/the court’s whispers, meaning tons of info for scum.

and prince meta is a joke if you are Possessor or Reaper

sorry about the rant, but i had a lot to say about this

Read full topic
